venue.name: Dick's Last Resort Faneuil Hall Marketplace

item.description:
All Boston Happy Hour Natives with a Friend of Harpoon card are invited to Harpoon's pre Mardi Gras Madness party at Dick's Last resort from 4:30 - 6:30 pm.

Bring your FOH card for free entry and and complimentary appetizers and a pint glass full of guess what?

Additional pints will only be $3.50
item.how_to_find_us: At the bar or in the reserved Harpoon section
item.why: IF you are a Friend of Harpoon you will know why to attend. You must apply for a card from Harpoon if you do not have one.
item.name: Friend of Harpoon Mardi Gras Madness Offer on Fat Tuesday at Dick's Last Resort
